response.original_title: Nîmeño II : au bout d’une passion
response.overview: This remarkable feature film tells the story of Christian Montcouquiol, Nimeño II, bringing together countless testimonies about the life of the maestro from Nîmes.
response.tagline: So that we never forget... That he gave everything. And that a bull took it all back.
response.title: Nîmeño II : au bout d’une passion
